name: Clock divider
description: This algorithm is a simple clock divider, outputting slower clocks from a faster one. The channels can use completely independent clocks, or share clocks. There is a shared reset input and a per-channel reset input. If either is active, the channel is reset.
use_cases: Creating polyrhythms by using different divisors on multiple channels
Synchronizing multiple sequencers or modules at different subdivisions

specifications.name: Channels
specifications.description: The number of clock channels to process.

params.name: Reset input
params.description: The shared reset input bus. 0 = None.

params.name: Divisor
params.description: The divisor, if the type is 'Free'. The divisor value is simply the parameter value.

params.name: Divisor (Metrical 2)
params.description: The divisor, if the type is 'Metrical (2)'.

params.name: Divisor (Metrical 2,3)
params.description: The divisor, if the type is 'Metrical (2,3)'.

params.name: Enable
params.description: Enables the channel. A disabled channel outputs nothing.

params.name: Input
params.description: The clock input bus to divide.

params.name: Reset input
params.description: The reset input bus for this channel. 0 = None.
